style: Ultra-Minimalist, High-Contrast Line Art, Lo-Fi Sketch, Pure Monochromatic
use_case: Psychological/Motivational Poster Art, Low-Fidelity Merch Graphics, Internet Meme Templates, Subversive T-Shirt Designs
template: Pure high-contrast black and white line art illustration of [SUBJECT]. Rough sketch, thick, scratchy lines, ultra-minimalist hand-drawn style, no shading, zero texture. Flat composition on a pure white background. [MOOD] atmosphere. Restricted palette: [COLOR]. Composition includes bold black text overlay: '[TEXT_OVERLAY]' --ar 4:3

variable_explanations.SUBJECT: Defines the core element and action (e.g., 'a watchful owl perched on a sign', 'two hands reaching for each other').
variable_explanations.MOOD: Sets the emotional tone of the resulting graphic (e.g., 'Anxious', 'Nostalgic', 'Motivational', 'Calm').
variable_explanations.COLOR: Crucial for maintaining fidelity. Should be set to 'Black and White Only' or similar phrases to block color addition.
variable_explanations.TEXT_OVERLAY: The specific text string that integrates into the composition, capturing the meme/poster aesthetic (e.g., 'Do not forget your purpose').

Composition includes bold black text overlay: 'GROW' --ar 4:3

Flat composition on a pure white background. Energetic atmosphere. Restricted palette: Hot Pink. Composition includes bold black text overlay: 'VIBRANT' --ar 4:3

tips: Always specify 'no shading' or 'flat color' (even though color is zero) to prevent the AI from adding tonal gradients or depth.
Keep the [SUBJECT] description very simple; complexity often breaks the minimalist line art style.
Use negative prompting (like `--no gradient, detail, shadow, color, grey`) if the initial output introduces unwanted tones.
description: A high-fidelity prompt template designed to replicate the aesthetic of raw, high-contrast, ultra-minimalist black and white line art often found in lo-fi internet graphics and psychological memes. Perfect for conveying simple, powerful concepts with maximum stylistic impact.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

suggestions: Consider: rustic, playful, cozy, soft, epic

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: EXCELLENT. The title 'Cinematic Neo-Noir Cityscape Photography' adheres perfectly to all structural requirements. It is concise (4 words), highly descriptive ('Cinematic Neo-Noir' provides immediate visual context), and clearly defines the output type ('Photography').
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: EXCELLENT. This template is a masterclass in specificity. The variable '{subject}' is clear. The core style descriptors ('Deep shadows, strong volumetric lighting, high contrast black and white, heavy grain') occupy appropriate prompt real estate. Crucially, the technical specifications ('Leica M6, 50mm Summilux lens, F/1.4, pushed Tri-X 400 film, 16k resolution') are exhaustive and demonstrate expert knowledge, ensuring highly consistent and professional output, fully matching the title's promise.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: EXCELLENT. The provision of 10 examples is ideal. The selection demonstrates excellent range, moving from character focus ('lonely detective,' 'mysterious woman') to environmental focus ('rain-slicked alleyway,' 'dilapidated jazz club') and symbolic objects ('glass of whiskey and a loaded revolver'). This mix assures potential buyers that the prompt is highly flexible within its specific niche.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: EXCELLENT. Use cases (album art, game assets, wall prints) are well-defined and target professional/semi-professional buyers. The suggested Premium price tier ($4.99) is justified by the extreme technical detail and niche specificity. The unique value proposition—combining specific cinematic style with precise analog photography emulation (Leica, Tri-X 400)—makes this prompt highly competitive.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: EXCELLENT. The description is direct and compelling. The hook ('Unleash the drama of classic film noir...') immediately sets the tone. All critical technical features (film stock emulation, B&W guarantee, hyper-realism) are clearly listed, and use cases are specified, providing immediate context for application.

priority_improvements: None. This prompt package is technically perfect and demonstrates a high level of market readiness and technical expertise. It is marketplace-ready.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Unlock the subconscious aesthetic: effortlessly transform your deepest concepts into breathtaking, gallery-ready Lo-Fi psychological line art.

*   **Atmosphere on Demand:** Forget struggling with technical parameters. This template automatically applies the perfect amount of subtle grain, distressed texture, and muted, atmospheric color palettes for instant, professional mood.
*   **Precision Line Weight:** Achieve the elusive quality of hand-drawn conceptual art. This prompt guarantees crisp, emotionally resonant line work and composition, ensuring your visuals are profound, not just sketches.
*   **Conceptual Depth Engine:** Designed specifically to interpret abstract ideas. Simply input complex emotions, philosophical concepts, or internal struggles, and watch them materialize into visually compelling narratives with unparalleled clarity.

Ideal for album covers, evocative social media content, conceptual art portfolios, therapy visualizations, and striking personal wall prints.

Skip the learning curve entirely. If you can type a word, you can now generate museum-quality conceptual art in a single click—guaranteed.
_original_topic: Lo-Fi Psychological Line Art (The Inner Voice)
enhancement_log: Title fixed: Lo-Fi Psychological Line Art (The Inner Voice) -> Moody Psychological Line Art
